text:
After exploring your options, ask yourself this question: 

“What will I say no to?” 

This question uncovers your true priorities. 

It reveals the best path forward for your team. 

It uncovers your true purpose. 

This question helps you make the highest contribution. 

You contribute to your own goals. 

You also contribute to your organization’s mission. 

This question delivers rare clarity. 

It is necessary for game-changing breakthroughs. 

This applies in your career and in your life.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The essential question to uncover true priorities and purpose is not what to say yes to, but what to say no to.
